title: Margot James – 2019 Speech on Designers
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Margot James, the Minister for Digital and the Creative Industries, on 26 June 2019.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/margotjames-300x200.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/margotjames.jpg)

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[QOF]: Quality Outcomes Framework

It demonstrates that design can be an exciting catalyst for such cross border collaboration, which is ever more important today.
